sentences.en: ...women's and Latino organizations that say he is insensitive to civil rights.
sentences.cn: …指责他漠视民权的女性和拉丁美洲人的组织。

sentences.en: As elsewhere, the name of the page is case insensitive.
sentences.cn: 另外, 页面的名字不区分大小写.

sentences.en: Dictionary order, case - insensitive, uppercase preference, for use with 1252 Character Set.
sentences.cn: 字典顺序, 不区分大小写, 大写字母优先, 用于1252字符集.

sentences.en: He was insensitive to all kinds of discourtesy.
sentences.cn: 他脸皮很厚,对随便什么侮辱都不在乎.

sentences.en: He was insensitive to her grief.
sentences.cn: 他对她的悲伤无动于衷.

sentences.en: How you can be so insensitive absolutely beats me.
sentences.cn: 我真搞不懂你怎么会这么麻木。

sentences.en: I shall not dignify this insensitive remark with an answer.
sentences.cn: 我不会欣赏这种毫无亮点的回答.

sentences.en: I was annoyed by his insensitive remarks.
sentences.cn: 我听了他那些没分寸的话,心里很不痛快.

sentences.en: Most laboratory animals are quite insensitive to enterotoxin.
sentences.cn: 大多数实验动物对肠毒素极不敏感.

sentences.en: She's completely insensitive to my feelings.
Starting in Windows XP, device object names are case insensitive.
sentences.cn: 在WindowsXP的一开始, 设备对象名称(就)是事例不敏感的.

sentences.en: The compensation must be insensitive to temperature and to lateral dislevelment.
sentences.cn: 补偿作用必须不受温度和侧向不水平的影响.

sentences.en: The new initiation system relevant to the insensitive ammunition was summarized.
sentences.cn: 概述了与钝感弹药密切相关的新型引爆系统.

sentences.en: The plates are insensitive to red light.
sentences.cn: 这些干片均对红光感觉迟钝.

sentences.en: To others we seem insensitive and arrogant.
sentences.cn: 在外人看来,我们似乎有点麻木不仁和飞扬跋扈.

sentences.en: Villains are characteristically mean, rude, insensitive, conceited and selfish.
sentences.cn: 恶人性格特点是:刻薄 、 粗鲁 、 感觉麻木 、 自负和自私.

words.tran_cn: 无感觉的；无情的；无生命的
感觉迟钝；不灵敏性；昏迷
感觉迟钝的，对…没有感觉的

trans.tran_cn: 感觉迟钝的，（对某事物）无感觉的，（对变化）懵然不知的，不敏感的
trans.tran_en: Someone who is insensitive to a situation or to a need does not think or care about it
